name: Merseytravel Saveaway (1 day rail, bus & ferry)
description:
MERSEYTRAVEL SAVEAWAY Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day across the Mersey rail network extending as far as Southport, Ormskirk, Kirkby, Hunts Cross, Ellesmere Port, Chester, 
      West Kirby and New Brighton. Also valid on most buses and the "All Area" ticket is also valid on ferries. *Tickets bought at Merseyrail stations are issued on "Metrocards" for which there is a £1 activation fee.

LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them. A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
